sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ModalLoginNeedToLogin />
    <button class="simulation-button" @click="handleButtonClick">
    Go to simulation
    </button>
</template>

<script>
import ModalLoginNeedToLogin from './Authorization/ModalNeedToLogin.vue';

export default {
  name: 'SimulationButton',
  components: {
    ModalLoginNeedToLogin
  },
  data() {
    return {
      authenticated: false
    };
  },
  methods: {
    handleButtonClick() {
      if (this.authenticated) {
        this.$router.push('/simulation');
      } else {
        // If not authenticated, show the login modal
        this.showNeedToLoginModal();
      }
    },
    showNeedToLoginModal() {
      // Logic to show the login modal goes here
      // You might want to emit an event or use a state management solution
    }
  },
  computed: {

  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>

a
{
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
}
.simulation-button {
  background-color: #417B5A;
  border: none;
  color: white;
  font-weight: bold;
  padding: 10px 20px;
  text-align: center;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-block;
  font-size: 16px;
  margin: 4px 2px;
  cursor: pointer;
  border-radius: 8px;
  box-shadow: 0 2px #999;
}

.simulation-button:hover {background-color: #45a049}

.simulation-button:active {
  background-color: #45a049;
  box-shadow: 0 2px #666;
  transform: translateY(2px);
}
</style>
